item.description:
Ladies, come join me for a different kind of workout! In Strip Fit we start slow with a warm up that includes belly dance, latin dance, hip hop, and pilates, then really break a sweat learning and rehearsing a fun and flirty chair routine! You'll actually have some fun while getting in shape!

The hour long class is $10 or $90 for a ten pack

*Please arrive 5-10 minutes early if it's your first time at the studio*Note-This class is for women only*

There must be at least 3 participants for this class to run and if there are at least 6 participants I will provide a babysitter free of charge (in the waiting room with the blinds closed).

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
